summary: A nice collection of shield splash screens for Mod Organizer 2.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000][size=5][b]FOR MOD ORGANIZER 2 (TWO) !! SORRY GUYS, MY MISTAKE :([/b]
[/size][/color][img]https://i.imgur.com/aXS9sK0.png[/img]﻿

[b][size=3]Check the screenshots.
Just move the splash.png file to the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/6194]Mod Organizer 2[/url]﻿ folder and replace when asked.
(where ModOrganizer.exe is located)
[/size][/b][b]Enjoy!

[/b][color=#ffd966][size=4][b]I'm open to suggestions, tell me what you would like to see and I'll most probably upload some more.
[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center]﻿[/center]
author: Elsopa
